name: cypress-localstorage-commands
description: Extends Cypress' cy commands with localStorage methods. Allows preserving localStorage between tests
author: Javier Brea

scripts.lint:typescript: cd test-e2e/typescript && npm run copy:library && npm run lint
scripts.lint:javascript: eslint src test test-e2e/react-app/src test-e2e/react-app/cypress test-e2e/react-app/*.js *.js
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:javascript && npm run lint:typescript
scripts.lint: npm run test:e2e:typescript:install && npm run lint:all
scripts.test:e2e:react:ci: cd test-e2e/react-app && npm i && npm run test:ci
scripts.test:e2e:typescript:ci: cd test-e2e/typescript && npm i && npm run test:ci
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:react:ci && npm run test:e2e:typescript:ci
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:unit && npm run test:mutation && npm run test:e2e
